snippet: Nine men believed to have pulled off a daring robbery in London’s diamond district over the Easter weekend were arrested Tuesday in raids in London and Kent by more than 200 police officers.
abstract: Nine men thought to have staged robbery in London’s diamond district over Easter weekend are arrested in raids in London and Kent by more than 200 police officers.
lead_paragraph: Nine men believed to have pulled off a daring robbery in London’s diamond district over the Easter weekend were arrested Tuesday in raids in London and Kent by more than 200 police officers.

headline.main: 9 Are Arrested in London Jewel Heist
headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: 9 Arrested in Jewel Heist
